title: HERB-OX® GRANULATED BEEF FLAVORED BOUILLON & SEASONING WITH OTHER NATURAL FLAVORS-SODIUM FREE (41199)
description: HERB-OX® Granulated Beef Flavored Bouillon & Seasoning with other Natural Flavors-Sodium Free granules are a uniform blend of dried free-flowing ingredi...
text:
Hormel Ingredients - Fats hacer su documentación disponible en las siguiente/s región/es
Norteamérica
HERB-OX® Granulated Beef Flavored Bouillon & Seasoning with other Natural Flavors-Sodium Free granules are a uniform blend of dried free-flowing ingredients. The granules wet-out quickly in hot water with only a limited stirring and then quickly dissolves into a rich brown solution. MSG has not been added to this product while sodium has been reduced by substituting with potassium and other formulation changes.
HERB-OX® Granulated Beef Flavored Bouillon & Seasoning with other Natural Flavors-Sodium Free is ready to consume as a tasty hot drink or as a flavoring in a dry pasta or soup mix. It can be added to dips, sauces, stew or vegetables. It has an appearance of a brown granular powder with a beefy aroma/flavor.
Empresa
Hormel Foods Specialty Products - Fats is a segment belonging to overall Hormel Foods Specialty Products division of Hormel Foods. Their vast array of products are backed by Hormel's expertise and their attention to value and quality. Their goal is to have the Specialty Foods division serve as a "one-stop shop" for manufacturers both large and small. Their flavored fats are used to enhance salad, main entree, bakery and meat products. They are also used to boost flavors in gravies, sauces and soups.
La información presentada aquí fue adquirida por UL desde el productor del material. UL hace un esfuerzo considerable para asegurar la exactitud de estos datos. Sin embargo, UL no asume responsabilidad por los valores de los datos y alienta firmemente a que tras la selección final del material, los puntos de los datos sean validados con el proveedor de la materia

Multiple Lists
